DOC.detailed_description: Atrial fibrillation ( AF ) common cardiac arrhythmia clinical practice . Chronic Heart failure ( CHF ) become major clinical public health problem . Both AF CHF often co-exist complicate 's administration.Several risk factor demonstrate associate risk AF Patients CHF . Lopez et al . find high level low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDLc ) total cholesterol associate low incidence AF independently risk factor Atherosclerosis Risk Communities ( ARIC ) study . Thus purpose study determine whether lipid level relate incidence atrial fibrillation Patients chronic heart failure . This study maybe provide novel opinion prevention AF patient CHF .
